verses.verse: Now <WH6258> therefore listen, <WH8085> O Israel, <WH3478> to the statutes <WH2706> and to the judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> I teach <WH3925> you, for to do <WH6213> them, that you may live, <WH2421> and go <WH935> in and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of your fathers <WH1> gives <WH5414> you.

You shall not add <WH3254> to the word <WH1697> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you, neither <WH3808> shall you diminish <WH1639> ought from it, that you may keep <WH8104> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you.

Your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> what <WH853> <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> did <WH6213> because of Baalpeor: <WH1187> for all <WH3605> the men <WH376> that followed <WH1980> <WH310> Baalpeor, <WH1187> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> has destroyed <WH8045> them from among <WH7130> you.
But you that did join <WH1695> to the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> are alive <WH2416> every <WH3605> one of you this day. <WH3117>

Behold, <WH7200> I have taught <WH3925> you statutes <WH2706> and judgments, <WH4941> even as the LORD <WH3068> my God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> me, that you should do <WH6213> so <WH3651> in the land <WH776> where <WH834> <WH8033> you go <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it.

Keep <WH8104> therefore and do <WH6213> them; for this <WH1931> is your wisdom <WH2451> and your understanding <WH998> in the sight <WH5869> of the nations, <WH5971> which <WH834> shall hear <WH8085> all <WH3605> these <WH428> statutes, <WH2706> and say, <WH559> Surely this <WH2088> great <WH1419> nation <WH1471> is a wise <WH2450> and understanding <WH995> people. <WH5971>

For what <WH4310> nation <WH1471> is there so great, <WH1419> who <WH834> has God <WH430> so near <WH7126> to them, as the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> is in all <WH3605> things that we call <WH7121> on him for?

And what <WH4310> nation <WH1471> is there so great, <WH1419> that has statutes <WH2706> and judgments <WH4941> so righteous <WH6662> as all <WH3605> this <WH2063> law, <WH8451> which <WH834> I set <WH5414> before <WH6440> you this day? <WH3117>

Only <WH7535> take heed <WH8104> to yourself, and keep <WH8104> your soul <WH5315> diligently, <WH3966> lest <WH6435> you forget <WH7911> the things <WH1697> which <WH834> your eyes <WH5869> have seen, <WH7200> and lest <WH6435> they depart <WH5493> from your heart <WH3824> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of your life: <WH2416> but teach <WH3045> them your sons, <WH1121> and your sons' <WH1121> sons; <WH1121>

Specially the day <WH3117> that you stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> in Horeb, <WH2722> when the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, Gather <WH6950> me the people <WH5971> together, and I will make them hear <WH8085> my words, <WH1697> that they may learn <WH3925> to fear <WH3372> me all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> that they shall live <WH2416> on the earth, <WH127> and that they may teach <WH3925> their children. <WH1121>

And you came <WH7126> near <WH7126> and stood <WH5975> under <WH8478> the mountain; <WH2022> and the mountain <WH2022> burned <WH1197> with fire <WH784> to the middle <WH3820> of heaven, <WH8064> with darkness, <WH2822> clouds, <WH6051> and thick darkness. <WH6205>

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to you out of the middle <WH8432> of the fire: <WH784> you heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the words, <WH1697> but saw <WH7200> no <WH369> similitude; <WH8544> only <WH2108> you heard <WH8085> a voice. <WH6963>

And he declared <WH5046> to you his covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> he commanded <WH6680> you to perform, <WH6213> even ten <WH6235> commandments; <WH1697> and he wrote <WH3789> them on two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone. <WH68>

And the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> me at that time <WH6256> to teach <WH3925> you statutes <WH2706> and judgments, <WH4941> that you might do <WH6213> them in the land <WH776> where <WH834> <WH8033> you go <WH5674> over <WH5674> to possess <WH3423> it.

Take you therefore good <WH3966> heed <WH8104> to yourselves; <WH5315> for you saw <WH7200> no <WH3808> manner of similitude <WH8544> on <WH5921> the day <WH3117> that the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to you in Horeb <WH2722> out of the middle <WH8432> of the fire: <WH784>

Lest <WH6435> you corrupt <WH7843> yourselves, and make <WH6213> you a graven <WH6459> image, the similitude <WH8544> of any <WH3605> figure, <WH5566> the likeness <WH8403> of male <WH2145> or <WH176> female, <WH5347>
The likeness <WH8403> of any <WH3605> beast <WH929> that is on <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> the likeness <WH8403> of any <WH3605> winged <WH3671> fowl <WH6833> that flies <WH5774> in the air, <WH8064>

The likeness <WH8403> of any <WH3605> thing that creeps <WH7430> on <WH5921> the ground, <WH127> the likeness <WH8403> of any <WH3605> fish <WH1710> that is in the waters <WH4325> beneath <WH8478> the earth: <WH776>

And lest <WH6435> you lift <WH5375> up your eyes <WH5869> to heaven, <WH8064> and when you see <WH7200> the sun, <WH8121> and the moon, <WH3394> and the stars, <WH3556> even all <WH3605> the host <WH6635> of heaven, <WH8064> should be driven <WH5080> to worship <WH7812> them, and serve <WH5647> them, which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> has divided <WH2505> to all <WH3605> nations <WH5971> under <WH8478> the whole <WH3605> heaven. <WH8064>

But the LORD <WH3068> has taken <WH3947> you, and brought <WH3318> you forth <WH3318> out of the iron <WH1270> furnace, <WH3564> even out of Egypt, <WH4714> to be to him a people <WH5971> of inheritance, <WH5159> as you are this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Furthermore the LORD <WH3068> was angry <WH599> with me for your sakes, <WH1697> and swore <WH7650> that I should not go <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan, <WH3383> and that I should not go <WH935> in to that good <WH2896> land, <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you for an inheritance: <WH5159>

But I must die <WH4191> in this <WH2088> land, <WH776> I must not go <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan: <WH3383> but you shall go <WH5674> over, <WH5674> and possess <WH3423> that good <WH2896> land. <WH776>

Take heed <WH8104> to yourselves, lest <WH6435> you forget <WH7911> the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which <WH834> he made with you, and make <WH6213> you a graven <WH6459> image, or the likeness <WH8544> of any <WH3605> thing, which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> has forbidden <WH6680> you.
For the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> is a consuming <WH398> fire, <WH784> even a jealous <WH7067> God. <WH410>

When <WH3588> you shall beget <WH3205> children, <WH1121> and children's children, <WH1121> and you shall have remained <WH3462> long in the land, <WH776> and shall corrupt <WH7843> yourselves, and make <WH6213> a graven <WH6459> image, or the likeness <WH8544> of any <WH3605> thing, and shall do <WH6213> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> to provoke him to anger: <WH3707>

I call <WH5749> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776> to witness <WH5749> against you this day, <WH3117> that you shall soon <WH4116> utterly perish <WH6> from off <WH5921> the land <WH776> whereunto <WH834> you go <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383> to possess <WH3423> it; you shall not prolong <WH748> your days <WH3117> on it, but shall utterly be destroyed. <WH8045>

And the LORD <WH3068> shall scatter <WH6327> you among the nations, <WH5971> and you shall be left <WH7604> few <WH4962> in number <WH4557> among the heathen, <WH1471> where <WH834> <WH8033> the LORD <WH3068> shall lead <WH5090> you.

And there <WH8033> you shall serve <WH5647> gods, <WH430> the work <WH4639> of men's <WH120> hands, <WH3027> wood <WH6086> and stone, <WH68> which <WH834> neither <WH3808> see, <WH7200> nor <WH3808> hear, <WH8085> nor <WH3808> eat, <WH398> nor <WH3808> smell. <WH7306>

But if from there <WH8033> you shall seek <WH1245> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> you shall find <WH4672> him, if <WH3588> you seek <WH1875> him with all <WH3605> your heart <WH3824> and with all <WH3605> your soul. <WH5315>

When you are in tribulation, <WH6862> and all <WH3605> these <WH428> things <WH1697> are come <WH4672> on you, even in the latter <WH319> days, <WH3117> if you turn <WH7725> to the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and shall be obedient <WH8085> to his voice; <WH6963>

(For the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> is a merciful <WH7349> God; <WH410>) he will not forsake <WH7503> you, neither <WH3808> destroy <WH7843> you, nor <WH3808> forget <WH7911> the covenant <WH1285> of your fathers <WH1> which <WH834> he swore <WH7650> to them.

For ask <WH7592> now <WH4994> of the days <WH3117> that are past, <WH7223> which <WH834> were before <WH6440> you, since <WH4480> the day <WH3117> that God <WH430> created <WH1254> man <WH120> on the earth, <WH776> and ask from the one side <WH7097> of heaven <WH8064> to the other, whether there has been <WH1961> any such thing as this <WH2088> great <WH1419> thing <WH1697> is, or <WH176> has been heard <WH8085> like <WH3644> it?
Did ever people <WH5971> hear <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of God <WH430> speaking <WH1696> out of the middle <WH8432> of the fire, <WH784> as you have heard, <WH8085> and live? <WH2421>

Or <WH176> has God <WH430> assayed <WH5254> to go <WH935> and take <WH3947> him a nation <WH1471> from the middle <WH7130> of another nation, <WH1471> by temptations, <WH4531> by signs, <WH226> and by wonders, <WH4159> and by war, <WH4421> and by a mighty <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and by a stretched <WH5186> out arm, <WH2220> and by great <WH1419> terrors, <WH4172> according to all <WH3605> that the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> did <WH6213> for you in Egypt <WH4714> before your eyes? <WH5869>
To you it was showed, <WH7200> that you might know <WH3045> that the LORD <WH3068> he is God; <WH430> there is none <WH369> else <WH5750> beside <WH905> him.

Out of heaven <WH8064> he made you to hear <WH8085> his voice, <WH6963> that he might instruct <WH3256> you: and on earth <WH776> he showed <WH7200> you his great <WH1419> fire; <WH784> and you heard <WH8085> his words <WH1697> out of the middle <WH8432> of the fire. <WH784>

And because <WH8478> <WH3588> he loved <WH157> your fathers, <WH1> therefore he chose <WH977> their seed <WH2233> after <WH310> them, and brought <WH3318> you out in his sight <WH6440> with his mighty <WH1419> power <WH3581> out of Egypt; <WH4714>

To drive <WH3423> out nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> you greater <WH1419> and mightier <WH6099> than you are, to bring <WH935> you in, to give <WH5414> you their land <WH776> for an inheritance, <WH5159> as it is this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Know <WH3045> therefore this day, <WH3117> and consider <WH7725> it in your heart, <WH3824> that the LORD <WH3068> he is God <WH430> in heaven <WH8064> above, <WH4605> and on the earth <WH776> beneath: <WH8478> there is none <WH369> else. <WH5750>

You shall keep <WH8104> therefore his statutes, <WH2706> and his commandments, <WH4687> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day, <WH3117> that it may go well <WH3190> with you, and with your children <WH1121> after <WH310> you, and that you may prolong <WH748> your days <WH3117> on the earth, <WH127> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you, for ever. <WH3605> <WH3117>
Then <WH227> Moses <WH4872> severed <WH914> three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> on <WH5921> this side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> toward the sun <WH8121> rise; <WH4217>

That the slayer <WH7523> might flee <WH5127> thither, <WH8033> which <WH834> should kill <WH7523> his neighbor <WH7453> unawares, <WH1097> <WH1847> and hated <WH8130> him not in times <WH8543> past; <WH8032> and that fleeing <WH5127> to one <WH259> of these <WH411> cities <WH5892> he might live: <WH2425>

Namely, Bezer <WH1221> in the wilderness, <WH4057> in the plain <WH4334> country, <WH776> of the Reubenites; <WH7206> and Ramoth <WH7216> in Gilead, <WH1568> of the Gadites; <WH1425> and Golan <WH1474> in Bashan, <WH1316> of the Manassites. <WH4520>
And this <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> set <WH7760> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>

These <WH428> are the testimonies, <WH5713> and the statutes, <WH2706> and the judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> after they came <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of Egypt. <WH4714>

On <WH5921> this side <WH5676> Jordan, <WH3383> in the valley <WH1516> over <WH4136> against <WH4136> Bethpeor, <WH1047> in the land <WH776> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> who <WH834> dwelled <WH3427> at Heshbon, <WH2809> whom <WH834> Moses <WH4872> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> smote, <WH5221> after they were come <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of Egypt: <WH4714>

And they possessed <WH3423> his land, <WH776> and the land <WH776> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> which <WH834> were on <WH5921> this side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> toward the sun <WH8121> rise; <WH4217>
From Aroer, <WH6177> which <WH834> is by the bank <WH8193> of the river <WH5158> Arnon, <WH769> even to mount <WH2022> Sion, <WH7865> which <WH1931> is Hermon, <WH2768>

And all <WH3605> the plain <WH6160> on <WH5921> this side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> eastward, <WH4217> even to the sea <WH3220> of the plain, <WH6160> under <WH8478> the springs <WH794> of Pisgah. <WH6449>
